title: Bonus Episode: Don’t Think for Yourself, Chapter 1
itunes:title: Bonus Episode: Don’t Think for Yourself, Chapter 1
description: Peter reads the first chapter of his new book Don’t Think for Yourself: Authority and Belief in Medieval Philosophy, available from University of Notre Dame Press. Pre-order with the code 14FF20 from undpress.nd.edu, to get a 20% discount!
